Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Significantly inhibits the growth of Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria.
Sequence Information.PTM: Contains two disulfide bonds 3-16; 7-12, and Arginine amide at R17.

Literature.Title: Tachyplesins isolated from hemocytes of Southeast Asian horseshoe crabs (Carcinoscorpius rotundicauda and Tachypleus gigas) identification of a new tachyplesin, tachyplesin III, and a processing intermediate of its precursor.
Literature.Author: Muta T, Fujimoto T, Nakajima H, Iwanaga S.
